pages.index: Crafted Creations India - Handcrafted Products Manufacturer and Seller CraftedCreations Home Home About About Reviews Reviews Contact Contact Home Home About About Reviews Reviews Contact Contact © 2024 CraftedCreations crafted-creations@gmail.com+91-408-4789294 Discover the finest handcrafted products from India’s skilled artisans. Our diverse range of items reflects the rich cultural heritage and timeless craftsmanship of India. Each piece in our collection is a testament to the meticulous attention to detail and the dedication of the artisans who create them. From intricately woven textiles to exquisitely crafted jewelry, our products embody the vibrant traditions and artistic excellence that India is renowned for. Our curated selection includes a variety of handcrafted goods, such as traditional clothing, home decor, accessories, and more. Each item is made using high-quality materials and age-old techniques, ensuring both beauty and durability. Whether you’re looking for a unique gift or a special addition to your own collection, you’ll find something that speaks to you in our store. About Us The Beauty of Handcrafted Art Craftsmanship excellence driven by tradition and dedication At CraftedCreations, our mission goes beyond offering beautiful handmade products; it’s about fostering a deep connection between the artisans and our customers. We work closely with talented craftsmen and women from across India, bringing their exceptional skills and stories to a global audience. Each item in our collection is carefully selected for its quality and uniqueness, ensuring that it stands out as a true work of art. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of craftsmanship, with every piece undergoing rigorous quality checks. Our dedication to excellence means you can trust that every purchase from CraftedCreations is an investment in a timeless tradition. By choosing our products, you are not only acquiring a beautiful piece but also supporting a sustainable and equitable marketplace that values creativity and heritage. Let CraftedCreations be your gateway to the rich tapestry of Indian culture and craftsmanship, where every item is a celebration of tradition, passion, and artistry. About Us At CraftedCreations, we believe that every piece tells a story. Our collection features a curated selection of handcrafted items that are as unique as the artisans who create them. From traditional embroidery to modern designs, each product embodies a blend of age-old techniques and contemporary flair. Our artisans pour their heart and soul into their work, resulting in creations that exude authenticity and charm. Whether you’re looking for a statement piece for your home or a thoughtful gift, CraftedCreations provides a treasure trove of exquisite handmade products that are sure to inspire and delight. Join us in celebrating the rich legacy of Indian craftsmanship and make every purchase a step towards preserving this invaluable heritage. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Crafted Creations India CraftedCreations Home Home About About Reviews Reviews Contact Contact Home Home About About Reviews Reviews Contact Contact © 2024 CraftedCreations crafted-creations@gmail.com+91-408-4789294 Privacy Policy Crafted Creations India respects your privacy and is committed to protecting it. This Privacy Policy explains our policies and practices regarding the collection, use, disclosure, and protection of your information. 1. Information We Collect: We collect personal information such as your name, address, email address, and phone number when you interact with us through our website or in person. We may also collect information about your purchases and preferences to enhance your shopping experience. 2. Use of Information: We use the information we collect to process orders, provide customer service, improve our products and services, and communicate with you about promotions and updates. Additionally, we use your information to personalize your shopping experience and to better understand your needs and preferences. 3. Sharing of Information: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties unless we provide you with advance notice. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property, or safety. 4. Data Security: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you place an order or enter, submit, or access your personal information. Our website uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology to encrypt your information during transmission to ensure it is protected against unauthorized access. 5. Your Consent: By using our website, you consent to our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to this policy, please do not use our site. 6. Changes to Our Privacy Policy: Any changes we may make to our Privacy Policy will be posted on this page. We reserve the right to update or modify this policy at any time, and any changes will be effective immediately upon posting. It is your responsibility to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. 7. Accessing and Updating Your Information: You have the right to access, update, and correct inaccuracies in your personal information in our custody and control, subject to certain exceptions prescribed by law. You may request to access, update, or delete your personal information by contacting us at the contact information provided below. 8. Retention of Information: We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected or as required by law. 9. Cookies and Tracking Technologies: Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and understand where our visitors are coming from. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings. 10. Third-Party Links: Our website may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of those sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit. 11. Children's Privacy: Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have inadvertently received personal information from a user under the age of 13, we will delete such information from our records. For further queries, please contact us at +91-408-4789294 or crafted-creations@gmail.com Our address is ASHOKA AVENUE, 10A, Church Rd, Sector D, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070.
